titles.title: To prohibit offices of Congress from appointing interns who are citizens of certain countries which exert malign foreign influences in the United States.
To prohibit offices of Congress from appointing interns who are citizens of certain countries which exert malign foreign influences in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: This bill prohibits a congressional office from appointing an intern who is a citizen of a specified foreign country (e.g., Russia, Iran, North Korea, or China).
